body: I was just wondering how good you people out there think I am. If you don't know me, then look at my profile for info. P.S. I'm a rusher not a mass pvper
body_tagged: I was just wondering how good you people out there think I am. If you don't know me, then look at my profile for info. P.S. I'm a rusher not a mass pvper
title: How would you rate me on a scale of 1 to 10

replies.body:
Hello Chill!

If you didn't know, there was actually already a thread which was made for "rating the player above you at PvP".
https://avicus.net/forums/f4951da1e

Thanks!
